headline: Constellation Brands, Inc. (STZ): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Constellation Brands, Inc. on Bearstone’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on STZ. Constellation Brands, Inc.’s share was trading at $156.70as of January 30th. STZ’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.50 and 12.02 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Constellation Brands (STZ) is a durable, cash-generating business focused on […]
